price: Telah tampak kerusakan di darat dan di laut disebabkan karena perbuatan tangan manusia supaya Allah merasakan kepada mereka sebagian dari (akibat) perbuatan mereka agar mereka kembali (ke jalan yang benar).
arabic: ظَهَرَ ٱلۡفَسَادُ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِي ٱلنَّاسِ لِيُذِيقَهُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ẓahara al-fasādu fī al-bari wal-baḥri bimā kasabat aydī al-nāsi liyudhīqahum baʿḍa alladhī ʿamilū laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: so that He may let them taste
